mapper.select: select u.*, ur.name as userRoleStr from xc_mng_users u, xc_mng_user_role ur where u.UserRole=ur.tid
mapper.insert: insert into xc_mng_users (UserName, UserPassword, NickName, UserType, UserRole, phone, CreateTime) values (#{userName},#{userPassword},#{nickName},#{userType},#{userRole},#{phone},#{createTime})
